instructions.title: Rules
instructions.content:
Welcome to Prisma. This is an exit game based on a true story. If you want to know all the secrets about the background, you have to pass all the levels and enter the final solution word. The rules of the game are simple. You must complete all levels in the shortest possible time and enter the correct solution word for each level on this website to succeed. The website will tell you whether the solution word was right or wrong.

In your room there is a suitcase, in this suitcase there are more boxes, each box represents a different level (marked by a black and white number). You can only open the box with the next level after you have solved the previous level. 

1. CARDS: In each box (or level) you will find cards marked with letters on a red background. The red stickers have no significance for the course of the game and only serve to keep things tidy. There is at least one card with a QR code for each level. This will take you to other puzzles on the web, but you can always access these puzzles via the website of the current level. 

2. aids: Each puzzle starts with an introductory text and ends with a text. These texts never contain important clues, but are primarily for suspense and entertainment. From level to level you also collect aids. Not all cards and aids are always needed immediately, some you have to save for later, expect the unexpected.

3. HELP: If you need help or tips and the hints on the cards and on the web are not enough, detailed help is available on the website of the current level.

4. IMPORTANT: In addition to the tools provided, you will also need a working smartphone with an internet connection (and perhaps more equipment). It might also be helpful to have pen and paper ready to take notes.

5. THE GAME BEGINS: What are you waiting for? Start the game and complete all levels to unravel the mystery behind Prisma!

spoilerWarning.title: Warning
spoilerWarning.subtitle: Spoiler Warning: Proceed with Caution!
spoilerWarning.description: In the shadowy realms of this digital odyssey, assistance is coded. While we've restrained the omnipotent hints that could decrypt all, know they exist. Should you find yourself lost within this cyber maze, revisit the overlooked data fragments. But BEWARE: Initiate the search codes only if truly trapped - for hacking the game's matrix with these keys diminishes the thrill of the conquest.
